body_html:
@hagerrady13 It is stated in System Information that TensorFlow is installed from source, but in Description it is stated otherwise. Which one is correct? If installing TensorFlow with bazel, you can add -DEIGEN_USE_BLAS to bazel build command.

To check whether CBLAS_GEMM is applied you can use:

np.__config__.show()
body:
@hagerrady13 It is stated in System Information that TensorFlow is installed from source, but in Description it is stated otherwise. Which one is correct? If installing TensorFlow with bazel, you can add `-DEIGEN_USE_BLAS ` to `bazel build` command.

To check whether CBLAS_GEMM is applied you can use:

```
np.__config__.show()
```
